name: Hugs + Kisses Greeting Card
description:
A simple, iconic design based on Spark+Mettle's logo.

Free postage and packing!

This is a thick 350gsm, FSC-credited paper stock. With a light satin coating on the outside, the inside is left uncoated, making it easier for you to write your own message. Each card is individually scored, ensuring a clean fold. Dimensions: 4.13" x 5.82" (105mm x 148mm).

For just £1 more we can handwrite a greeting and mail the card on your behalf. 

Please note: orders made after 5pm on Friday February cannot be guaranteed to be processed and mailed in time for Valentine's day.

If you want us to play Cupid, you must choose your message: 

- "Be mine" 
- "Roses are red / violets a blue / I got a stranger / to send this to you"
- Or create your own (25 words max)!

Remember to include your chosen message, plus the recipient's name and postal address when checking out. You can do so by clicking on "Note to Seller" on the checkout page.

options.name: A printed greetings card and we play Cupid

name: High Five E-Card/Greeting Card
description:
A simple, iconic design based on Spark+Mettle's logo.

Free postage and packing!

This is a thick 350gsm, FSC-credited paper stock. With a light satin coating on the outside, the inside is left uncoated, making it easier for you to write your own message. Each card is individually scored, ensuring a clean fold. Dimensions: 4.13" x 5.82" (105mm x 148mm).

For just £1 more we can handwrite a greeting and mail the card on your behalf. 

Please note: orders made after 5pm on Friday February cannot be guaranteed to be processed and mailed in time for Valentine's day.

If you want us to play Cupid, you must choose your message: 

- "Be mine" 
- "Roses are red / violets a blue / I got a stranger / to send this to you"
- Or create your own (25 words max)!

Remember to include your chosen message, plus the recipient's name and email/postal address when checking out.You can do so by clicking on "Note to Seller" on the checkout page.

If you would like to order this as an e-card, please refer to our Hugs+Kisses or Superhero e-card product pages for detailed information.

Remember to include your chosen message, plus the recipient's name and email/postal address when checking out.You can do so by clicking on "Note to Seller" on the checkout page.

options.name: An e-card and we play Cupid
A printed greeting card and we play Cupid

name: Hugs + Kisses E-Card
description:
A simple, iconic design based on Spark+Mettle's logo.

You can either just purchase the image and attach it to your own emaii. Or for £1 more we will create a simple, personalised e-card and mail it to your sweetheart from our valentine@sparkandmettle.org.uk address.

If you want us to play Cupid, then you need to choose your message: 

- "Be mine 
- "Roses are red / violets a blue / I got a stranger / to send this to you"
- Or create your own (25 words max)!

Remember to include your chosen message, plus the recipient's name and email/postal address when checking out. You can do so by clicking on "Note to Seller" on the checkout page.

Please note: for the regular e-card, the image used is just the "Superhero" (see its printed greeting card as an example).
